Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the transformation of "Benaras into Kyoto, Japan" and the magnitude of the building in Godowlia, stating that it has become a topic of discussion for the entire world.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the Modi government has kept its promise of transforming Benaras into Kyoto, Japan, without providing evidence or support for this assumption.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up its assertion that the Modi government has transformed Benaras into Kyoto, Japan.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photograph being circulated is not actually of Benaras, but of the Nanpu bridge in Shanghai, China.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the possibility that the photograph may be a satirical post or that it has been falsely attributed to the Modi government.
